features: ✿【WELL MADE & STURDINESS PRODUCT】: Defined Deco round serving tray is made by high quality wood which is sturdy and durable. Improved metal handle around the tray ensures the stability of the farmhouse decorative Tray . Three wood ball feet on the bottom ensures the stability while protect your table from being scratched.

✿【VERSATILE & LARGE SPACE】: Diameter of the round serving tray is 11.93 inch. Total height is 2.16 inch. Use the rustic round tray as a table centerpiece,coffee table tray or dress it up for the Holidays.

✿【GORGEOUS METAL HANDLE】: This rustic round tray stand comes with black metal handle round the bottom round wood tray. Add a modern touch to this tray while still keep the rustic farmhouse feel on it with bottom washed wood tray. Mix and match this circular round wood tray with other decorative objects such as bead garland, candle holder for your home decor.

✿【FARMHOUSE DECOR】: Fill your house with farmhouse accents that makes you feel right at home! Our farmhouse round serving tray stand features Brown washed finished with wood texture which is perfect for rustic farmhouse decor, kitchen island decor and farmhouse table centerpieces.

✿【PERFECT HOLIDAY GIFT FOR ANY OCCASION】: Give our special circular round tray to your special ONES! Perfect holiday gift for Birthdays, Thanks Giving, Christmas, Weddings, Anniversaries, Parties, Office, House Warming etc. Also nice addition to your Living room decor, kitchen counter, dinning table decor, coffee table decor, entry way and MORE!

✿【GOOD SERVICE】:If there is any damage or dissatisfaction with our decorative round tray, If you are not 100% satisfied with serving tray in the first 30 days, please contact us and we will give you a perfect solution.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DECORATIVE TRAY Description The charming Metal and Wood Tray by Defined Decor is perfect for treating yourself to an afternoon break you deserve.Just set your cup of tea and a small plate of cookies on it while you relax reading a good book.With such versatility, you will enjoy using it as a server when entertaining or creating a delightful display on your coffee table with a small floral bouquet in a favorite vase.The hand-painted round metal frame keeps items contained while carrying and is complemented by the lightly-stained wood insert.The small ball legs at the bottom will keep everything steady and adds another touch to the modern farmhouse theme.Measures 12" W x 12" D x 2.45" H.

PRACTICAL & BEAUTIFUL The trays for coffee tables are a great nice accent piece. The edge of the coffee table tray is designed with metal circle style, and they are in white/brown washed color, making them natural and simple. The circle metal and wood tray blend together will give you a shabby chic feeling, which can show your nice taste to others. WIDE RANGE of USAGE This tray decor is suitable for various of occasions, such as counter, living room, bathroom, bedroom or kitchen, you can place some small items on it, such as tea light, plant, salt and pepper and so on, you can also use it as a candle tray, tea tray, centerpiece tray. WOOD & GIFT The wood serving tray is made of quality MDF, sturdy and reliable, the surface is polished without redundant wood thorns to meet your long-term use needs. You can give the round serving tray as a housewarming present to her, they will be surprised by your gift, which can also increase your relationship.

Decorative Trays for Home Decor Adds Elegance to Your Home Crafted from high quality wood with a natural finishAdds elegance to your kitchen, bar, bedroom, dining area, family room, patio, garden, tea or coffee lounge. BEAUTIFUL QUALITY carefully crafted,each round tray is uniquely different. Smooth to the touch, satin/matte finish. The surface is not easily scratched and will look beautiful for years. Wipe clean with a damp cloth. GREAT GIFT Crafted from high quality Indian wood with a natural finish What a great gift for mom for mothers day, or any occasion, or as a housewarming gift or christmas present for someone who entertains a lot.

SO MANY USES This round serving tray wants to be your favourite 'go to' tray for any kind of entertaining - you can use this lovely wood tray for serving food and drinks - as a tea and coffee serving tray - as a wooden tray for your coffee table - as an ottoman tray - as a tea tray - carrying cups and plates for your parties.and as a stunning table centre piece on your island bench. Also lovely as a decorative tray for displaying decor or as a candle tray.

Makes a Stylish Addition to Your Home. Did you lose the remote? How about your keys? Maybe misplaced your wallet? Let this decorative centerpiece take out all of the guess work that may be causing excess stress not necessary in our lives. Made from sturdy wood, this circle tray for coffee table makes a stylish addition to your home.
Defined Deco Round Sreving Tray This stunning round wood serving tray has a beautiful soft lustre,is great for serving tea and coffee, cheese, or as a decorative tray for plants

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is very nice looking. I am using on my living coffee tale. I have several items on it and thy all fit nicely. Seems very well made.

reviews.reviewText: Just as pictured and makes a great addition to my living room. Love it!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect size, great quality
reviews.reviewText: love how beautiful this tray looks in my living room!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for my bathroom
reviews.reviewText: This has been on my bathroom counter for 3 months and I love it. I have kids in the home that get water all over the counter when using the sink and it has not rusted and the wood material has held up fantastic. Perfect size to fit my containers, and adds a nice touch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was ok. Smaller than expected and more rustic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice addition to the decor
reviews.reviewText: I love how this looks on my coffee table and matches the black accents that I have in my home. Be careful to not put something wet on it for too long, it could cause a ring.
